newsWatchDesc: An application which will display news articles. User can browse news articles through various categories. App will enable user to view news details and images.
sAppDesc:
Educational learning app with features such as Knowledge augmentation, tailored learning experiences, access to online study material, ease of communication.
Coming soon.
bmiCalcDesc: BMI Calculator is an app that allows you to monitor BMI and percentage of fat in your body. Ideal weight - app calculates the ideal weight you should gain.
aboutMe:
Innovative, task-driven professional, equipped with a record of success in consistently identifying and providing technological needs through ingenious innovation.

I am good at creating user interfaces, writing and testing codes, troubleshooting simple/complex issues, and implementing new features based on user feedback.

I am also proud of my ability to preserve and overcome any challenges as they come up.
